Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“You should get some rest if you’re tired.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Selphie}{Line}“Что-то я себя...{Line} не очень хорошо чувствую...”
{Char Zell}{Line}“{Char Squall}, ты что-нибудь знаешь о Тимбере?”{Line}Нет, и не хочу{Line}Не слишком много
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“{Char Squall}, y’know anything about Timber?”{Line}I don’t care{Line}Not too much

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Во! Что ж, позволь мне тебя просветить.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Thought so. Well, let me fill you in.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“У них тут даже журналы есть!”
{Char Zell}{Line}“Отпад!{Line} Только ради этого стоило стать сидом!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“This is pretty damn amazing.{Line} It pays to be a member of SeeD!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“C’mon, let me tell you{Line} what I know about Timber!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“C’mon, let me tell you{Line} what I know about Timber!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Вот не надо так... я ведь рассказать хочу!”{Line}Мне и без этого хорошо{Line}Валяй...
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Don’t be like that... I wanna tell you!”{Line}Nah, it’s ok{Line}All right...

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“ДА БЛИН! Ну, дай расскажу!”{Line}Просто помолчи{Line}Ладно... рассказывай
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“C’MON! I wanna tell you what I know!”{Line}Just be quiet{Line}Fine... Talk
Zell{Line}“Yep, that’s what I wanted to hear.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Когда-то Тимбер был обычной страной,{Line} окружённой густыми лесами.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Timber used to be a country{Line} surrounded by deep forests.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Но 18 лет тому назад,{Line} её захватила Гальбадия.”
{Char Zell}{Line}“Тимбер сдался почти без боя.{Line} И теперь страна оккупирована Гальбадией.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Timber fell quite easily to{Line} Galbadia. So now Timber is{Line} under Galbadian occupation.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Говорят, что сейчас там полно{Line} отрядов сопротивления.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“It’s said there’s a whole{Line} bunch of resistance factions,{Line} big and small.”
Zell{Line}“Somethin’s wrong with me, too...{Line} I...feel...sleepy...”

Monologue.Current: Train Announcement{Line}“We will be arriving in Timber shortly.{Line} For those getting off, please be sure{Line} you have all your belongings.”
Monologue.Original: Train Announcement{Line}“We will be arriving in Timber shortly.{Line} For those getting off, please be sure{Line} you have all your belongings.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“We should be there soon, eh?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“We should be there soon, eh?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Here we go...{Line} Psyche yourself up, baby!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Here we go...{Line} Psyche yourself up, baby!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Maybe someone released some sleeping gas?{Line} There’s lots of people who resent SeeD.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Maybe someone released some sleeping gas?{Line} There’s lots of people who resent SeeD.”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“Am I missing anything? Anyone hurt?”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“Am I missing anything? Anyone hurt?”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“Hee! I had such a nice dream!”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“Hee! I had such a nice dream!”

Monologue.Current: (I had a dream, too.{Line} It wasn’t nice though...)
Monologue.Original: (I had a dream, too.{Line} It wasn’t nice though...)

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“But seriously, Sir Laguna was sooo cool!”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“But seriously, Sir Laguna was sooo cool!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Hey! There was a Laguna in my dream, too!{Line} He’s a Galbadian soldier, right!?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Hey! There was a Laguna in my dream, too!{Line} He’s a Galbadian soldier, right!?”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“There’s no way we can understand this...{Line} Let’s just concentrate on our first mission!”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“There’s no way we can understand this...{Line} Let’s just concentrate on our first mission!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“We’ll put this incident on hold.{Line} I’ll report it to the headmaster{Line} once we get back to Garden.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“We’ll put this incident on hold.{Line} I’ll report it to the headmaster{Line} once we get back to Garden.”
